mansha anubhawayadhanamadaya nisa apagathawana hatiniwi sanasunu sitha githa rachanayata ma yomu kalagabsawa nithyanukula kala yuthu da?asimitha aadarayabrahma guna athi mawupiyoswamiya bharyawata piyek wiya yuthuyimathale halangoda shri saranankara daham pasalasamajayata karadarayak nowi jiwathwime kalawakawi sankalpanapranitha dharma labena mangadawanu labuwo geta ethda?anada himiyange charithayen pilibimbauwana uthum minis gunanamo buddhaya lokaye pawathmatherani gi therikabuduruwa idiriye pinpetti thabima harida?mama ee kathawata ekangawenne naduka sapa nithi peraleraththota polwaththakanda shri bodhirukkharama wiharayamathale udupihilla halangoda aithihasika kohon wiharastha shri saranankara daham pasala bosath darudariyan dahas gananakage daham danuma wardhanaya pinisa mehewarak itu kala pradeshaye gaurawadarayata bandun wu daham pasalaki. 1980 wasare di kohon wiharadhipathi halangoda silawansha saranankara himiyan wisin aarambha karana lada daham pasale mulma pradhanacharya waraya washayen wishramalath widuhalpathi ee. am. aar. bandara mahatha agana sewayak itu kara atha.aarambhaye shishya sankhyawa 80k pamana daham adhyapanaya hadara atha. 1989 pawathi rate kalabalakari thaththwaya hethuwen wasara dekak pamana daham pasala wasa damimata sidu wi thibe.
